content: this playful summer tote bag is designed to be functional and stylish the bag is constructed by working off of the unique rope-like handle worked quickly in half_double_crochet this bag is fun and beginner friendly this tote is worked by holding two strands of yarn together for a thick structured bag you will construct three pieces two sides and a bottom the pieces will be seamed together using mattress stitch a full step-by-step video tutorial is available alongside this pattern the rope-like handles of the bag are constructed with the sides in one piece a free version of this pattern can be viewed on my blog 2 a step by step video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel 3 this pattern is written in one size and will create a tote that is 15 wide 6 deep and 13 tall materials 4 skeins / 876 yards lion brand rewind yarn shown in willow size us l-11 8 0 mm crochet hook tapestry needle to weave in ends gauge 8 sts and 8 row = 4 in half_double_crochet with yarn held double this is a beginner/easy level crochet pattern this pattern is written in us english terms this pattern and photographs of this garment are property of kaitlin barthold of originally lovely this pattern photos and design are subject to copyright and are for personal use only all commercial use is strictly prohibited you may not produce or distribute this pattern under any circumstances 2 https //www originallylovely com/crochet/cove-crochet-tote-bag-pattern/ 3 https //youtu be/9ikcj5lsmhe
